summary:
Okay, I just thought about this...
If Arya didn’t give two shits about Gendry, then what went down AFTER they had sex before...
body:
Okay, I just thought about this…

If Arya didn’t give two shits about Gendry, then what went down AFTER they had sex before they went to sleep? Why did she linger after they fucked? Why did she go to sleep beside him? Did Arya just dip out before Gendry woke up? Did they talk?

It just doesn’t make sense at all.

summary: Eyes Like The Ocean
title: Eyes Like The Ocean
body:
She was standing on the edge of a cliff staring at the waves crashing against the rocks below. The sun was gleaming against the surface making the water glitter blue; a blue that reminded her of his ocean eyes. 

It has been nearly a year since she’d seen him; seen those eyes that scared her deep in her core. It was his size or temper (or lack there of) but rather the feelings that he could awaken deep within her. 

Those feelings that she had suppressed for so long were threatening to crash to the surface of her being, much like the waves that were crashing below her. But she needed them to. She needed those feelings to burst through her untamed chest. She had to open the flood gates and let the emotion rage like a rolling thunder storm, because if she didn’t then she would be letting him down. The one person that made her realize there was more to life than death. 

When she finally decided to come back to Westoros, she knew that her first stop would be Storm’s End. She knew that the only way for her FEEL again was to see the stubborn bull. To smell his musky odor from working in the forge. To touch his rough skin that was stained with soot. She wanted to hear his velvet voice and to explore his diamond mind like she has years ago. 

So when the boat docked and raven flew, she made her way to the edge of Storms End to await those intoxicating ocean eyes. 

First, “Ocean Eyes” by Billie Eilish has been in my head all week and I needed to get it out! I had this idea for a ficlet and Arya remembering Gendry’s eyes, so I came up with this. It is sort and sweet and to the point. Also, this is like my first time writing fanfic so be nice, but like also tell me how I can improve! Anyway, hope you like!!

blog.name: danieldaystreep
blog.title: You Win Or You Die
blog.description: oscars, movies and actors/actresses i like

summary: i got a couple asks about what i think GRRM’s ending for arya/gendry is and i stand by my theory that gendry dies in the books...
body:
i got a couple asks about what i think GRRM’s ending for arya/gendry is and i stand by my theory that gendry dies in the books during the long night battle. i was reminded of a conversation i had with a friend before 8x03 and a bunch of fleaks were floating around saying gendry dies and my friend was like ‘yeah i could see him dying cause he served his purpose already’ and i was like ok but if he dies arya’s gonna be so DONE with everything.. and yeah, that makes all of this work so much better? that’s why i was so nervous about him dying before 8x03 like it just made too much sense but then he didn’t die and we got this instead and now nothing makes sense. 

it all diverged when they decided to kill off all of robert’s bastards in season 2 and never introduce edric storm thus gendry had to assume that role and it snowballed from there. then in s7, he kind of circled back to his book storyline with the brotherhood who i believe will be playing a role in the long night in books as well. i also firmly believe the long night in the books is going to be WAAAAAY more intense and serious than in the show where it was lame. GRRM said the main characters have more or less the same fate, the secondary characters may not. gendry on the show had to survive for house baratheon cause they didn’t have any back up bastards. the books have plenty and tbh the most likely to assume that role is edric storm not necessarily gendry. i think edric would have to be dead first before they give storm’s end to gendry. 

if arya and gendry reunite in the books, a similar scenario plays out as 8x01-02 (maybe not as sexual due to her younger age in the books or maybe GRRM does the time jump after all idk), they’re falling in love, she’s starting to reconnect with her humanity and she wants to choose life over death.. only for him to die tragically. i mean bitch i would be done with this shit, i could 100% understand abandoning everything and frodo’ing myself to the west. in the show, arya is leaving her family and friends for no reason. in the book, if that plays out, she’d really just have the worst most nihilistic outlook on life cause the people she loves will always die on her. 

anyways, we all know GRRM is a sadistic fucker who makes us wanna die but it always makes sense in the books and it simply doesn’t on the show. that’s sort of my way of rationalizing this ending tbh.

summary:
I think I finally accepted Gendrya’s fate and you know what? It’s beautiful and surprisingly quite realistic. 
Gendry loved Arya...
body:
I think I finally accepted Gendrya’s fate and you know what? It’s beautiful and surprisingly quite realistic.

Gendry loved Arya he used to know, old Arya he grew up with and the one he would follow anywhere. He never had a chance to get to know new Arya, traumatized and emotionless one. Arya loved Gendry who reminded her who she was. But after all she knew that there is no future for them. He finally got chance to have a better life, the life he dreamed of. And she finally gave up path of death. But she couldn’t stay with him. Just think about it, becoming his wife or even staying in Winterfell would be for her like a prison. She’s wild, curious of wolrd and ready for more adventures. And Gendry always loved his forge, I think deep inside he preferred calmer life. He wouldn’t be happy traveling with her and giving up chance he just got.

So despite of this beautiful love they shared, they couldn’t be together. This is realistic and kinda poetic. Love they shared is hopeless but beautiful. They found each other after all this years just to realize that they aren’t meant to be together. And in order to be happy they need to go in different directions.

tags: sorry i don't have a clear answer
summary: Soooo, since it's bullshit that Dany and Arya don't get along (Arya would love a Queen Regnant who frees slaves and kills the...
question: Soooo, since it's bullshit that Dany and Arya don't get along (Arya would love a Queen Regnant who frees slaves and kills the masters, lbh, and once Dany realized her father was a tyrant and Ned not a usurper's dog they would get along fine), how would you envision their meeting with their book!personalites?
answer:
I’ve got an unpublished WIP that explores that exact idea!

Book!Arya and Book!Dany’s first meeting may go badly or very well depending on the context. I think there would be some suspicion or mistrust at first based on family history. Arya won’t know quite what to expect from Daenerys, especially if the stories about her vary from “liberator queen” to “crazy tyrant” which they likely will. Daenerys might expect distrust and be unsure herself since she was raised to hate Ned Stark. So there may be an initial clash. On the other hand it could be an awkward but giddy “Oh, hi, you love Jon?! I also love Jon!”

blog.title: You Win Or You Die
blog.description: oscars, movies and actors/actresses i like

summary: What’s funny to me is that I think D&D actually think it’s in character for Arya to just sail away while leaving everything...
question: What’s funny to me is that I think D&D actually think it’s in character for Arya to just sail away while leaving everything behind. They consider this a happy ending for her. Arya redefining what it means to be a lady while running her lord husband’s castle is in character for book Arya but was never even considered an option for her in the show. This is the final product of years of misunderstanding of Arya’s character. I mean the whole “I wanted to be a knight” last season said it all.
answer: Honestly I do believe this is GRRM’s ending for her now. There was that fan who met him once and asked about Gendrya and he said something like “they have separate futures” and also I think floated the idea of an Arya sequel/spinoff so all signs point to a similar ending. But if it does happen in the books, I’m sure it’ll make a lot more sense than how it happens on the show. Also the context might be totally different- for all we know Gendry might die in the books and Edric Storm becomes Lord of Storms End and that would probably be a reasonable motivation for Arya to say fuck it all I’m leaving. GRRM said secondary characters do have different book vs show fates but the main characters are mostly the same.

blog.name: danieldaystreep
blog.title: You Win Or You Die
blog.description: oscars, movies and actors/actresses i like

summary: jon and arya's relationship is non existent on the show. all her relationships with her siblings are nothing. hate to say it but...
question: jon and arya's relationship is non existent on the show. all her relationships with her siblings are nothing. hate to say it but jon and sansa are the only well developed sibling pair in the show.
answer:
That is sadly true. They just completely detached Arya from everyone at this point it’s hard to care.. like a few seasons ago if you told me Jon and Arya would never see each other again and that Arya would VOLUNTARILY choose to leave Jon forever, I would’ve been like WTF no way. But after this season, I’m just like ok I guess gurl simply doesn’t care anymore and I don’t either.

The show did do a good job of Jon/Sansa development but the bulk of that was Season 6 when the show was still functional and hadn’t fallen off a cliff yet. I loathe that ship romantically but at this point they probably are the closest siblings? It makes sense that they’re also going to be the closest geographically (nights watch men can easily visit Winterfell regularly like Benjen did so I see that as a fitting ending).

summary: Any favourite ships?
question: Any favourite ships?
answer: i would honestly die for gendry and arya, i just want them to have a happily ever after where arya can still kick ass and be her best badass self, all with gendry by her side adoring her for who she is. then carlisle and esme, i mean marriage goals, i can’t believe that after over a hundred years they’re still so disgustingly in love. lastly peggy and steve, i don’t even need to explain myself for this one. and i just realized all of these are heterosexual ships, i’m disgusted ! where the hell are my gays ? i need for y’all to be so disgustingly cute to the point it makes me wanna vomit.
